TopicTitle: RSS, FAR and a few other mods

Articles.Content:
Just started playing with RSS and FAR. Im using the 10X kerbin system mod and its amazing. Never used it before as it was always too hard, but just really started getting to grips with it and stuff.

It kind of makes just getting into orbit so much more rewarding as it is harder and takes much longer (about 6-7 mins IRL time)

My shuttle in orbit

I love RSS. When I first got to orbit it felt like when I first picked up KSP all over again. You should try the Earth next chance you get. Being able to change launch sites is just.. so.. freakin cool.
I love RSS I have a second install for my RSS KSP. I recently went to 6.4Kerbin and I love the change in scale and the lower mod count.
There's also Jumbo32 and Jumbo5x, for those who want slightly less of a challenge, but more than stock.
Just got the whole RO pack! Incredible with the CSS shuttle. Cant wait till the RSS Visual Enhancements pack is updated again!
